attributes.action: A call for all home nations to boycott the FIFA Russia 2018 World Cup.
attributes.background: It is an outright disgrace that the home nations should be partaking in a sporting competition in a country that has committed numerous war crimes in Syria. Nothing NEEDS to be added to that, but..organised hooliganism, outright racism, and state sponsered drugging make this event implausible.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the football associations in the home nations, not the UK Government or Parliament.
